Rename files with number inside a folder

rename_files_with_number.Rd

Rename files with number inside a folder

Usage

rename_files_with_number(
  path_to_folder,
  remove_zip_files_with_parenthesis = TRUE
)

Arguments

path_to_folder

(required) Path to folder

remove_zip_files_with_parenthesis

(logical, default TRUE). Do we remove zip_files with parenthesis in the name?

Value

Nothing. Only modify files in a folder

Author

Adrien Taudière

On this page

Developed by Adrien Taudière, Lise Roy.
